reviews.review: Still a classic, amazing story, fun physics. Love it all, the nostalgia, and the stuff I forgot.

A atenção que a comunidade dá a esse game até hj é impressionante, a quantidade de mod feito com novos desafios deixando o game com desafios mais complexos, e  até mesmo spin-offs da história é uma coisa extremamente foda. 

Enquanto o Gabe não aprende a contar até 3 é o que temos...
portal go pew and you go move 10/10 would portal agqain

Mega gra. Ciekawe zagadki, samo stosowanie tytułowych portali wywołuje ciekawy kierunek główkowania, taki trochę nietypowy i inny niż w "klasycznych" łamigłówkach.
Do tego świetnie poprowadzona i ciekawa historia, niby prosta, a ma w sobie to coś przez to co widzisz po drodze i słyszysz. Płynnie kontunuuje historię z poprzedniej części. Chce się grać, chce się myśleć.
Jedyny minus takiej gry to to że jest za krótka... Ale warto zagrać w tą grę i w kolejne części.
Polecam!
It is a puzzle game, that is fun to replay multiple times. 5/5
good story, fun co-op, and debug keybinds so you can shoot your friends with rockets. a great game people who play alone or people who work better with a partner. there's something for everyone.
cool game brain hurt coop mode very very good
bilgisayarım çok güzel ama bu oyunu oynadıkdan sonra her oyunum kasmaya başladı
The best of the best of the best.  Unrivaled.

This is a very fun game and i love to do the community made maps also, the story line is amazing, Love the mechanics, I would recommend this to everyone.
me dijeron monstruo, pero el juego esta entretenido :)
Посмотрите спидраны по этой игре, а потом представьте что это играли вы. А только потом проснитесь
This game is funny, and really interesting. Highly recommend.
Its amazing, it funni, it fun to plae, an l e m o n
Very fun and hard. Had to pull up some lets plays at points because of the difficultly. But otherwise it's very fun.

The best puzzle game out there and one of my favourite games of all time. Great story and ending, the multiplayer is also highly enjoyable. The community made multiplayer maps never fail to impress me either.
I n c r e d i b l e  g a m e .

Its waaay spicier than Portal 1. Its just better in any way than original Portal. It was especially more fun. Some puzzles were bit of a CBT that really pushed my autistic brain to its limits and took me a little bit too long then they should have. But its still 
is more fun.

So yeah do I recommend this ? Yes.
bana sorarsanız gayet güzel bir oyun ilk oynamanız da sarıyor ancak bir daha gireyim ve tekrar başlayayım diyemiyorsunuz

instructions unclear
got teleported to the moon
Biraz gerilim gibi tek başınıza oynayınca ama arkadaşlarla girince çok eğlendiriyor

This is hands down on of my favorite games, ever. I adore it so so much, the plot is interesting, the characters are compelling and fun, the game itself play wise is wonderful, it's so much fun multiplayer but just as rewarding an experience on your own, i honest to god love this game.
Totalmente recomndado un juego para pelearte con tus amistades las cuales no pueden razonar que tienen que cordinar para tirar un portal

Una obra maestra del vídeo juego. No hay discusión. No importa el tiempo que pase, o las nuevas propuestas en el medio que aparezcan, la narrativa y mecánicas de Portal no envejecen. Su humor es algo que genuina-mente ya no se encuentra de manera recurrente en el medio y sus característicos y carismáticos personajes son memorables. Una excelente compra si quieres palparte de un poco de la historia de los vídeo juegos.
this game is literally like (x_x) anyways stan wheatley
Как мне кажется серия игр Portal является лучшей среди головоломок с юмором!
This game is over 10 years old and feels and looks better than some modern AAA title. Puzzles are fun and game has amazing story.
i loved the game but when i boot it up it crashes this doesnt happen with other games and was working before
퍼즐도 재밌고 스토리도 재밌다. 엔딩 볼 때 가슴이 정말 뭉클했다. 글라도스님 그립습니다...

absolutely amazing storyline.  this game is a game to spend hours and hours learning about the amzing backstory. not only that but the mechanics and running speed of the game itself is breathtaking. 10/10

[h1]Заслуженно одна из самых лучших игр вообще[/h1]

[i]До меня уже давно много кто-то расписал об отдельных вещах, поэтому я буду краток:[/i]
В ней идеальна практически каждая мелочь: от плитки испытательных камер, до сюжета, шуток и мб даже скрытого смысла

Оперативная система Mac os High Sierra. Прошел всю игру, после последнего обновления игра просто стала вылетать. Удалял и переустанавливал игру, все бесполезно. Так же скачал патч Portal Reloaded, заходит начальное меню, затем после нажатия кнопки нью гейм после экрана прогрузки вылетает. Исправьте ошибку или верните потраченные средства за оплаченную игру Portal 2.

like some puzzel ? then this game is good for you
worth on discount? yea if you like the puzzel game and i reccomended to play portal 1 first before you play 2 to connected the story. 

worth gameplay? not a very long game but its up to you to buy
this game is awesome, from story to co op everything is just so fucking good

Просто класна класика, раджу пройти сюжетну і потом грати з друго в кооп

отличный сиквел превосходящий оригинал. Хороший сюжет, отличный юмор, харизматичные и живые, а главное не плоские персонажи. Испытания не слишком сложные, но и не слишком простые, идеальный баланс во вселенной
